Class RebalancingOperator

  • java.lang.Object

      • it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.logic.operator.RebalancingOperator

  • @Service
public class RebalancingOperator
extends AbstractOperator
    This class contains methods to re-balance the Portfolios.

    Cristian Laurini

    • Method Detail

      • rebalance

        public java.util.List<PortfolioEntity> rebalance(User user,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,FinancialDataEntity> financialDataPerAssetMap)
        This method re-balances a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        user - User is the user for which you want to re-balance the portfolio and contains the current portfolio and the active strategy.
        financialDataPerAssetMap - Map with asset id as key and a FinancialDataEntity as value.
        Returns:
        List of PortfolioEntities that represents the re-balanced portfolio.

      • rebalancePortfolio

        @CacheEvict(value={"activeStrategy","strategies","portfolio","portfolioHistory","currentCapital","capitalHistory","backtesting","forecast","demo","advice"},
            allEntries=true)
public boolean rebalancePortfolio(User user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.List<AssetEntity>> assetsPerClassMap,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,FinancialDataEntity> financialDataPerAssetMap)
        This method re-balances a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        user - User is the user for which you want to re-balance the portfolio and contains the current portfolio and the active strategy.
        assetsPerClassMap - Map with asset class id as key and a List of assets as value.
        financialDataPerAssetMap - Map with asset id as key and a FinancialDataEntity as value.
        Returns:
        Boolean that is true if the portfolio has been re-balanced, false instead.
